name: Div/Zero
description:
I needed to get my game dev projects a doing. So I started this small project as part of a game jam and I really wanna finish it now but can't.

CONTROLS:

WASD - moving around

CLICK to interact

ASSETS USED :

Generic RPG pack : https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-rpg-pack

2D Pixel Art Dungeon : https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck
